text: John Brand Schneider from the Washington State University, Pullman, WA was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for contributions to the finite-difference time-domain method in computational electromagnetics. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Washington State University faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Washington State University alumni Category:Tulane University alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: John Brand Schneider
